Headline: #26 South Shore Express, #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near South Shore Drive/80th
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Express, 71 71st/South Shore  buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange. 79th and South Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express, #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange. 79th and South Shore Drive, due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/80th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Logan Square. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Logan Square.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
